p: Recombinant analysis carried out for URFA/B using jpHMM software revealed HIV-1 identical recombination models in Krasnoyarsk 12.2, 21.2, 48, 100, 131, and 132 ( Figure 8). Krasnoyarsk 64 demonstrated a similar recombination model with other viruses from that group with several differences in the location of recombination regions in pol gene.
